heading: Plate and/or seal required
text:
The holder of a certificate shall not be entitled to perform work or hold himself or herself
   out to perform work as a licensed master plumber until such plate and/or seal have been obtained. Further, no holder of a
   certificate of competence shall enter into any contractual agreement to install or alter any plumbing, gas piping, or any piping
   system, other than an employment agreement with a master plumber business or a city agency.
